DaD.creature

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.creature.Creature
      • DaD.creature.Hero

  • public class Hero
extends Creature
    Created by Clovis on 07/02/2017. Singleton for the hero. For the moment there is only one hero at a time during a game.
    See Also:
    Creature, HeroGenerator, HeroDeathReason, HeroGender, HeroRace, HeroInventory

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Env _experience
      Actual amount of experience the hero has.

      Gender of the hero

      Private instance of class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        private Hero()
        Private constructor.

      • Hero

        private Hero(MultiValueSet heroInformation)
        Private constructor.

        This constructor is used when loading a hero from a previous save or when creating a new one. We set the different attributes values depending on what is inside the MultiValueSet.

        Parameters:
        heroInformation - MultiValueSet containing all information about the hero

      • tryEquip

        public boolean tryEquip(ItemInstance item)
        Return true if the item can be equipped.

        This only take care of primary requirement like is item equipable and does hero has the required level. If there is an item already equipped here it can still return true.

        Parameters:
        item - Item you wish to know if you can equip it.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • tryUnequip

        public boolean tryUnequip(ItemInstance item)
        Return true if item can be unequipped.

        This is not used for now, but there might be future item that can only be unequipped in some specific way. example: cursed items

        Parameters:
        item - Item wish you want to know if you can unequip it.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • canAddGold

        public boolean canAddGold()
        Return true if hero can receive golds. True if inventory is not full or already contains item gold.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • addGold

        public void addGold(double gold)
        Add stack to item gold. WARNING! Does not check if hero already has gold item or inventory is full. Call canAddGold() to ensure this!
        Parameters:
        gold - amount of stack to add
        See Also:
        canAddGold()

      • canAfford

        public boolean canAfford(double gold)
        Return true if hero has exactly or more gold than given amount, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        gold - Amount of gold you want to check the player has
        Returns:
        boolean

      • decreaseGold

        public void decreaseGold(double gold)
        Decrease stacks of item gold from the given amount.

        WARNING! This does not verify if hero has the item gold neither required stack of it! Call canAfford(double) to ensure this!

        Parameters:
        gold - Amount of gold to decrease
        See Also:
        canAfford(double)

      • getAmountOfGold

        public int getAmountOfGold()
        Return stack of item gold, 0 if player has no gold item.
        Returns:
        int
